# Asset

> Teraslice asset for kafka operations

This is a package within the [Kafka Asset Bundle](https://github.com/terascope/kafka-assets) monorepo. See our [documentation](https://terascope.github.io/kafka-assets/docs/asset/overview) for more information or the [issues](https://github.com/terascope/kafka-assets/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Apkg%2Fasset) associated with this package
